styles.name: Chiaroscuro and Tenebrism
styles.description: Styles utilizing stark light and dark contrasts, creating dramatic and emotionally charged images with a sense of mystery and intrigue.

styles.name: Grisaille
styles.description: A monochromatic palette style giving images a 3D sculptural look, focusing on form and structure with minimalist aesthetics.

styles.name: Dark Synth
styles.description: Characterized by a dark, retro-futuristic, deconstructed look, suitable for edgy, avant-garde, and thought-provoking images.

styles.name: Vaporwave
styles.description: A colorful digital art style influenced by 1980s and 1990s computer graphics, creating vibrant and nostalgic images.

styles.name: Prismatic
styles.description: Marked by facets of color and geometric gem-like structures, ideal for dynamic and visually complex images.

styles.name: Sfumato
styles.description: Features softly blended colors and edges with indistinct outlines, producing subtle and nuanced imagery.

styles.name: Impasto
styles.description: Characterized by bold colors and thick brush strokes, creating vibrant images with a 3D quality.

styles.name: Pentimento
styles.description: Known for a layered effect with underlying images visible, creating complex and intriguing visuals.

styles.name: Diffusion
styles.description: Spreads and mixes colors to create unique patterns, ideal for striking and unique image creation.

styles.name: Deconstructivism
styles.description: Focused on fragmentation and radical freedom of form, suited for edgy and thought-provoking images.

styles.name: Fractal
styles.description: Characterized by infinitely complex patterns, perfect for dynamic and visually engaging images.

styles.name: Filigree
styles.description: Involves intricate metalwork and delicate patterns, creating elegant and sophisticated images.

styles.name: Sgraffito
styles.description: Known for cutting away surface layers to reveal intricate patterns, ideal for unique and complex visuals.

styles.name: Ukiyo-e
styles.description: A colorful, stylized Japanese woodblock print style, producing vibrant and dynamic imagery.

styles.name: Encaustic
styles.description: Uses wax and fire for a textured and layered surface, creating striking and unique images.

styles.name: Kinetic Art
styles.description: Characterized by motion extending beyond the frame, perfect for dynamic and engaging images.

styles.name: Op Art
styles.description: Focused on the illusion of movement and abstract geometric forms, ideal for complex and dynamic visuals.

styles.name: Aboriginal Dot Painting
styles.description: An indigenous Australian style with colorful dots and shapes, creating vibrant and culturally rich images.

styles.name: Feng Shui
styles.description: Characterized by circular compositions and symbols of natural balance, producing soothing and calming imagery.

styles.name: Wabi-Sabi
styles.description: Finds beauty in imperfection, creating gritty, muted images that are tranquil and calming.

styles.name: Surrealism
styles.description: Focuses on dream-like visuals with illogical, fantastical arrangements, evoking mystery and oddity.

styles.name: Art Deco
styles.description: Known for its sleek, geometric, and stylized designs, creating elegant and sophisticated imagery.

styles.name: Fauvism
styles.description: Emphasizes painterly qualities and strong, vibrant colors over realistic values.

styles.name: Constructivism
styles.description: Focuses on abstraction and modernity, using geometric forms and modern materials.

styles.name: Minimalism
styles.description: Known for simplicity and focus on the essentials of the form, creating clean, abstract compositions.

styles.name: Rococo
styles.description: Ornate and decorative, emphasizing lightness, elegance, and the use of curving natural forms.

styles.name: Neo-Expressionism
styles.description: Characterized by intense subjectivity, vivid colors, and dynamic, often unsettling compositions.

styles.name: Pop Art
styles.description: Utilizes aspects of mass culture and popular media, often with vivid colors and contemporary themes.

styles.name: Abstract Expressionism
styles.description: Focuses on spontaneous, automatic, or subconscious creation, emphasizing a non-representational approach.

styles.name: Hyperrealism
styles.description: Creates highly realistic and detailed images that often resemble high-resolution photographs.

styles.name: Art Nouveau
styles.description: Characterized by elegant, flowing lines and natural forms, creating ornate and decorative images.

styles.name: Cubism
styles.description: Known for abstracted forms and multiple viewpoints, creating fragmented and geometric images.

styles.name: Surrealism
styles.description: Focuses on dream-like, fantastical imagery with unexpected combinations and bizarre forms.

styles.name: Abstract Expressionism
styles.description: Emphasizes spontaneous, automatic, or subconscious creation, producing abstract and emotionally charged images.

styles.name: Pop Art
styles.description: Utilizes bright colors and commercial or popular culture imagery, creating bold and graphic images.

styles.name: Minimalism
styles.description: Focuses on simplicity and purity of form, often with monochromatic color schemes and basic geometric shapes.

styles.name: Art Deco
styles.description: Known for bold geometric patterns, rich colors, and lavish ornamentation, creating elegant and sophisticated images.

styles.name: Futurism
styles.description: Emphasizes speed, technology, and dynamic motion, creating energetic and forward-looking imagery.

styles.name: Constructivism
styles.description: Focuses on industrial materials and geometric forms, often with a political message, creating structured and abstract images.

styles.name: Gothic
styles.description: Characterized by dark, mysterious, and medieval elements, often creating moody and atmospheric images.

styles.name: Baroque
styles.description: Known for dramatic use of light and shadow, rich color palettes, and grandeur, creating dynamic and ornate images.

styles.name: Rococo
styles.description: Features elaborate ornamentation, pastel colors, and playful themes, creating light and charming imagery.

styles.name: Fauvism
styles.description: Emphasizes painterly qualities and strong, vibrant colors, creating intense and wild images.

styles.name: Byzantine
styles.description: Characterized by religious and imperial themes, gold backgrounds, and flat, symbolic figures, creating spiritual and iconic imagery.

styles.name: Dadaism
styles.description: Focuses on absurdity and anti-art sensibilities, often using collage and photomontage to create whimsical and nonsensical images.
